root.name: hue()

example.code: noStroke() colorMode(HSB, 255) c = color(0, 126, 255) fill(c) rect(15, 20, 35, 60) value = hue(c)# Sets 'value' to "0" fill(value) rect(50, 20, 35, 60)

root.description: Extracts the hue value from a color.

parameter.label: rgb
parameter.description: int: any value of the color datatype
